SA11n1110:4: budhvā yo hyavikalpatāṃ ca sugato'kalpyānaśeṣāṃśca saḥ
SA11n1110:8: traikāyikenaṃ sarvākārajñena buddhena bhagavatā śākyamuninā sarvasattvahitāya bahuvidhā saddharmadeśanā pravartitā |
SA11n1110:23: tathāhi-kautukādīnāṃ pañcatriṃśat ādikarmikāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ rājagṛhe piṇḍāya caratāmavamardena tadā madyavikretuḥ ( ekaḥ )
SA11n1110:29: puroja nāmadheyena brāhyaṇena pañcatriṃśad- vyādhakānadhikṛtya mithyā mārgo deśitaḥ falataḥ pañcatriṃśacchiraskamatsyarūpeṇa ( saḥ )
SA11n1110:50: mahāpātakānyapi nirantarātyantavipratisāreṇa ebhiścaturbalaiḥ māsaṃ varṣa yāvat pañcabhiraṅgaiḥ sabhūmisparśa ( praṇāmena )
SA11n1110:58: triṣu yāmeṣviti sapta dināni ( uparyuktavidhinā pratideśanā ) kartavyā |
SA11n1110:59: yadi āprattisaṃsparśāśaṅkā syāttadā dharmaikāṅgena ( pratideśanā ) vidheyā |
SA11n1110:61: yadi pūrva 'evaṃ mayā śrutam' iti tathā ante ( bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan )
SA11n1110:64: āryaratnakūṭadharmaparyāya- śatasāhasrikāsūtre nidānādisarvasyābhihitatvāt tata eva cāṃśato'sya ( triskandhasūtrarasya )
SA11n1110:69: āpattimūlasyābhāvāt kasyāpi pratideśanā na jñāyeteti cet ?
SA11n1110:79: agre ityādi vacanena ( pañcatriṃśadatirikta buddheṣvapi namaskāraḥ) abhihitaḥ |
SA11n1110:81: api tu dīrghāyuṣṭvānnirmāṇakāyasya tadanukūladiśāsu vidyamānatvāt daśasu dikṣu (vidyamānasattvānāṃ )
SA11n1110:83: nātra atītā anāgatāśca buddhāaḥ sākṣirūpeṇa samuddhṛtāḥ saṃvṛtito virodhāt |
SA11n1110:89: ataśca arthata evaṃ ( sarveḥ saha tathāgataśabdasya vidyamānatvaṃ )
SA11n1110:103: ayaṃ tasmin samaye bhagavato buddhasyāntevāsitvāt vinayavacanāni saṃgātupālernidiṣṭatvācca arhatparipṛcchayokto vinayaviniścayaḥ,
SA11n1110:114: athavā bodhyā pātayatīti bodhyāpattiriti tṛtīyāyāḥ prayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
SA11n1110:116: -janāḥ , na tu prāthamabhūmikā bodhisattvā ti jñātavyam |
SA11n1110:118: asyā āpatteḥ sthūlāyāḥ sūkṣmāyāḥ pārājayika-duṣkṛtāduṣkṛtānāṃ ca kramaḥ sūtrasyāsya (122)
SA11n1110:130: ṛjuḥ sthitvā ca sampaśyenmahatī saiva deśanā |
SA11n1110:133: (2) sāṃvṛtikī pratideśanā- iyaṃ tāvaccaturbhibalaiḥ sakaukṛtyena ca manasā sarva namaskārādikaṃ māyopamabuddhyā karaṇīyamiti |
SA11n1110:136: nivedite sati bhagavān teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmarthāya raśmibhirdaśadigavasthitān catustriṃśadbuddhādīn anekān nimantrayāmāsa |
SA11n1110:138: bodhisattvāḥ sakaukṛtyāḥ pūjāṃ cittotpādaṃ śaraṇagamanaṃ namaskārāt prabhṛti pāpadeśanaṃ yāvat yugapat kṛtvā sarvapāpaiḥ suviśuddhāḥ ( bhūtvā )
SA11n1110:140: tadanu tadanuyāyināṃ tāvāt vijane sthāne maṇḍalena pūjayā ( pañcatriṃśadbuddhānāṃ )
SA11n1110:147: sarvaprathamaṃ yathārthapratideśanā tāvat āśrayabalainaivaṃ pāpapratideśanam- 'ahaṃ amukānāmā' ityādinā abhihitam |
SA11n1110:148: idamatra jñātavyaṃ yat āśrayabhūtān pañcatriṃśadbuddhān sampūjya samabhyarcya dvividhibodhicittotpārdo vidheyaḥ |
SA11n1110:153: api tu anyaiḥ kalyāṇamitrairye ātmānamupakṛtavantaḥ mātāpitarau yau kṛtajñatāyā bhājanabhūtau ,
SA11n1110:154: anantaiśca sattvaiḥ āgaganaṃ vyāpibhiḥ sattvairye ātmanā upakāryāḥ taiḥ sarveḥ saha śaraṇaṃ gantavyam |
SA11n1110:160: idaṃ tāvad asmākaṃ taccharaṇagamanasya tātparyam yad ( buddhyā )
SA11n1110:169: atra tu bodhisattvasaṃgha iti avaivartikasaṃgha evābhipretaḥ |
SA11n1110:170: ityevam āśrayabalaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ vidūṣaṇāasamudācārabalena pāpadeśanārtha tathāgate tyādyuktam |
SA11n1110:177: pravrajitanirmāṇakāyāḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaprabhāyuktāḥ kāyavarṇa-kṣetra-digdigantara-cīvarāyudhādīn dhārayitvā vajraparyaṅkamudrāsthitā vividhaparṣadbhiḥ saha buddhāḥ vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa madhyabhāgata ārabhya kramaśaḥ daśasu diśāsu virājamānā ālambanīyāḥ |
SA11n1110:184: piṇḍapātārtha cārikāṃ caran vā bhūmisparśādimudrāsthito vā buddhaḥ iti viditvā sarvāṃśca (buddhān)
SA11n1110:189: eteṣu prathamaṃ tāvanmadhye virājamānasya lokapaterbuddhasya guṇā(nākhyātuṃ)
SA11n1110:195: ata eva sa sarvebhyaḥ ( āryapudgalebhyo devebhyaśca )
SA11n1110:201: sampanna iti sambhāradvayena sva-parārtha- ( sampadbhyāṃ ca sampannaṃ )
SA11n1110:203: prahāṇasya jñānasya ca bhedadvayena buddho bhavatīti |
SA11n1110:204: ābhyāṃ tāvat saṃsāranirvāṇasthitebhyaḥ sarvapudgalebhyo viśiṣṭaḥ ( buddhaḥ )
SA11n1110:211: iti vā śākyarājavaṃśe jātatvād doṣajanmanāṃ vijetā iti |
SA11n1110:218: tasmai namaskāra iti tribhirdvāraiḥ śraddhāprasādayogena namaskaraṇam |
SA11n1110:222: pūrvavat pañca viśeṣaṇāni trisraśca vyākhyāḥ paścād āgāmibhiḥ ( sarvabuddhaiḥ )
SA11n1110:225: arthabalena ca śabdadvayena ekena vā vyaktīkariṣyate |
SA11n1110:255: yathā nāge śaityaṃ duṣṭatvaṃ ca bhavati tathaiva jñānamapi kleśa ( santāpa )
SA11n1110:260: yena rājeva sarveṣu pratāpavān manojñaḥ nirbhayaśca | (126)
SA11n1110:283: karūṇānvitena manasā ime sattvahitāya pravṛttāḥ santīti |
SA11n1110:299: te jñānena mahatā vīryeṇa ca sattvahitaṃ prasādhya kleśādīṃśca dahanti |
SA11n1110:322: te mahāprajñākarūṇānetrābhyāṃ dharmatāṃ prakāśayanti sattvahitaṃ ca sādhayantītyarthaḥ |
SA11n1110:324: yena te sarvasattvān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasaphalayorniyamena sthāpayanti |
SA11n1110:329: ratnaṃ candraṃ ca dhārayan buddhaḥ evāsti |
SA11n1110:353: patraphalayuktaṃ śrīphalavṛkṣaṃ dhārayanti sattvārtha ca kurvanti |
SA11n1110:354: atremān ūrdhvamāsane virājamānān vicintya svataḥ namaskārakaraṇena pāpāni viśudhyanti |
SA11n1110:357: ime parebhyaḥ sarvasukhopakaraṇāni sarvadā anirbādhaṃ vitaranti |
SA11n1110:374: athavā brahyeti sva-paraviśuddhikārakāṇāṃ aparimitaguṇānāṃ yogādayaṃ ( tathā )
SA11n1110:430: anena avidyādisantāpamapasārya śītalīkaraṇāt athavā candanamiti tadguṇaḥ,
SA11n1110:451: śvetaprabhāmaṇḍalaṃ dhārayan jīvanaṃ ca yāpayan virājate |
SA11n1110:479: merū padmaṃ ca dhārayan dharmacakramudrayā sthitaḥ san parivārajanebhyaḥ ( śiṣyebhyaḥ )
SA11n1110:481: atrāpi nārāyaṇo nāma tajjñānam yat sarva (vidha)
SA11n1110:487: ( ata eva ) apatyaḥ putra iti vā'bhihitaḥ |
SA11n1110:497: te tathāvidhayā śriyā sampattyā ca samanvitā iti |
SA11n1110:501: padmam apareṇa ca prakāśapuñjaṃ dhārayan ( virājate ) |
SA11n1110:505: ataḥ pūrvavartiṣu paścādvartiṣu ca ( sarvabuddheṣu viśeṣaṇamidam )
SA11n1110:508: yato hi sa atyantaṃ jyotiṣmān balānvitaśca |
SA11n1110:566: tathā tajjñānena dharmatā'vagamyate tayā ca suśobhitatvāt sa keturiti |
SA11n1110:567: dhvaja iti tadguṇaḥ samastasattvebhyaḥ saṃsāravijayadāyakaguṇena yuktatvāt |
SA11n1110:577: yena sarvasattvānāṃ māradamanaṃ kleśadamanaṃ ca sampādyate |
SA11n1110:590: 'vi' iti tajjñānam vijetṛtvaṃ ca tadguṇaḥ sva-parasaṃsāravijayakṣamatvāt |
SA11n1110:609: yato hi tena jñānena sattvānām avidyāyā nivāraṇaṃ kriyate |
SA11n1110:625: -kṣetre ratna padmasupratiṣṭhitaśailendrarājaḥ tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ virājamāno yāpayati |
SA11n1110:635: atra ratna padmetyādyāsanaiḥ tadguṇaḥ kārya jñānaṃ ca pradarśyante |
SA11n1110:651: taditthaṃ namaskāravyākhyānasamanantaramidānīṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ samakṣaṃ deśanā ( vidheyā ) |
SA11n1110:652: tadarthameṣāṃ buddhānāṃ svābhimukhaṃ dhyānākarṣaṇārtha prārthanā 'evaṃ pramukhe' tyādinā kathitā |
SA11n1110:654: ātmanaḥ jānudvayaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya hastābhyāṃ śirasi añjaliṃ baddhvā sādaraṃ ( pūrvoktaṃ )
SA11n1110:675: 'mayā' etāvatkālaparyantametāvat pāpaṃ kṛtam ityevaṃ manasi vicintya kaukṛtyamanubhavitavyam |
SA11n1110:676: atra 'asyāṃ jātau' iti iha janmani kṛtapāpānāṃ smaraṇamiti |
SA11n1110:678: anādikāla iti sāmānyatayā sāṃsārikāṇāṃ jīvānāmākāśavadanantatvaṃ nāma |
SA11n1110:680: tadapi yathā pūrvajanmasu saṃsaraṇaṃ tathaiva iha janmanyanāgate cāpi janmani ( saṃsaraṇam ) iti |
SA11n1110:681: 'anyāsu vā jātiṣu' ityanena tiryagādiṣaḍyoniṣu ( janmagrahaṇaṃ pradarśitam ) |
SA11n1110:682: tṛtīyaḥ khalu svabhāvena svapāpadeśanamittham- ' pāpakam' ityādinā |
SA11n1110:683: tadapi 'mayā adya yāvad etāvat pāpaṃ kṛtam' ityevaṃ vipratisārapūrvakaṃ mānasikaṃ khedaṃ prakaṭayan deśanā kartavyā- ayamevāsyārthaḥ |
SA11n1110:684: pāpānyapi karmāṇyavidyāmāśritya rāgādibhistribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ kāyādibhistribhirdvāraiḥ sampādyante |
SA11n1110:691: atra pāpamityanena ( tadeva pāpaṃ grahītavyaṃ yeṣām )
SA11n1110:696: kāyādibhiḥ kṛtāni prāṇātipātādi daśa ( akuśalāni ) bhavanti |
SA11n1110:707: viśeṣataḥ adattādānādiṣu gurūtareṣu pañcasu atra trīṇyeva nirdiṣṭāni |
SA11n1110:708: sattvahitāya aṣṭavidhacaityeṣu samarpitaṃ suvarṇādikaṃ tāvad dhanaṃ ( staupikam ) iti |
SA11n1110:716: tatrāpi gurūtaraṃ tāvat caturdigavasthitasya saṃghasya atithyādīnāṃ ca dhanasya sākṣādapaharaṇaṃ luṇṭhanaṃ ceti |
SA11n1110:722: na ca bhavati pāpatatphalānāṃ kaścit sīmā |
SA11n1110:724: api ca, paraprāṇātipātādīnāṃ daśakuśalānāṃ kartā ( purūṣaḥ )
SA11n1110:725: tasminneva māse niḥsaṃkocaṃ pratideśanāyāṃ praviśedityapi jñeyam |
SA11n1110:728: tathā hi- ityevaṃ dāhakarān vipākān anuvicintya svacittadoṣān apasārayan atyantaṃ vipratisāreṇa saha pratideśayet |
SA11n1110:730: atrāpi eteṣāṃ karmaṇāmāvaraṇasya tātparya jñānasya spaṣṭatāyā bādhakamiti |
SA11n1110:742: tayoḥ prathame tāvat śītāḥ ( aṣṭau narakāḥ, aṣṭau ca )
SA11n1110:745: ( narakāḥ ) | dvitīyataśca sthāna-dṛṣṭyā ceme bhavanti dviprakārakāḥ |
SA11n1110:759: etāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ durgatīnāṃ hetavaḥ prāyeṇa prāṇātipāta-matsara- mohajādikarmāṇītyavagantavyāḥ |
SA11n1110:761: antataśca laghūnāṃ duṣkarmāṇāṃ phalaṃ pratyantapradeśe ( janma ) |
SA11n1110:768: athavā pratyantā mlecchā ityapi kecid abhiprayanti |
SA11n1110:770: dīrghāyuṣo devā bahulapuṇyatvena saha gādāhaṅkāriṇo bhavanti |
SA11n1110:778: ( daivāt ) manuṣyayonāvapi janmasambhave rūpādyādhipatyakāriṣu cakṣurādipañcasu ṣaṭsu vendriyeṣu doṣasadbhāvātte saddharmārthasya na jñātāro bhāgyavantaśca na bhavantu |
SA11n1110:779: teṣu ekasya dvayostrayāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ pañcāṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ va ( indriyāṇāṃ )
SA11n1110:782: samyagdṛṣṭivikalānāṃ sattvānāṃ 'na santi buddhādayaḥ' ityadhvavasāyinī viparītadṛṣṭireva ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA11n1110:790: āgamanakāle na kevalaṃ nasmakārādikaṃ na kurvantyapitu apavādamapi kurvanti |
SA11n1110:791: api ca, idamevābhilakṣya buddhaśūnye sthāne janmāpi aṣṭamaḥ ( akṣaṇaḥ ) |
SA11n1110:795: sa eva samyak sākṣī, na tvanyaḥ |
SA11n1110:817: evaṃ baladvayaṃ pradarśya samprati pratyāpattibalena pāpadeśanārtham “āyatyāṃ saṃvaramāpadye“ ityuktam |
SA11n1110:827: rogeṇa hānirbhavet tadā samprati bhojanodakādikam avarodhanīyam |
SA11n1110:834: ityevaṃ balatrayaṃ pradarśya samprati caturthasya pratipakṣasamudācārabalasya pratipādanārtham 'buddhāḥ' ityādikam ( uktam ) |
SA11n1110:835: atra sarveṣāṃ pāpānāṃ puna punaḥ vṛddhirodhanārtha puṇyasaṃcayārtha ca santatisthakuśalasya pradarśanaṃ tāvadauṣadhiriva jñeyam |
SA11n1110:836: atra bodhisattvasya samastāḥ pariṇāmanāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā bhavanti |
SA11n1110:853: kṣāntyanukūla tāvad brahyacaryam tacca pāpavirahitaṃ sat maitryādiṣu sthitvā ākruṣṭasya akaraṇena arthād apratyākruṣṭena śramaṇadharmeṇa yuktam |
SA11n1110:856: mahāvīrye sthitena mayā pañcābhijñābhiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ viparītadṛṣṭinivāraṇaṃ viparītamārgādapasāraṇaṃ kṛtvā ( citta )
SA11n1110:858: ( arthāt ) muktāḥ kṛtārthāḥ kriyanta ityevaṃ jñātavyam |
SA11n1110:863: ekāgratayā avasthānaṃ tāvad aviparyasto mārga iti |
SA11n1110:880: pṛthak-pṛthak kuśalānāṃ vastūnāṃ caikatra sampiṇḍanaṃ kriyate,
SA11n1110:903: yadi nāsti svayaṃ pariṇāmanājñānaṃ tadā anena ( pūrvoktavidhinā )
SA11n1110:905: traikālikabuddhaiḥ kṛtāyāḥ pariṇāmanāyāḥ sadṛśī pariṇāmanā mayā'pi sādaraṃ karaṇīyeti (141)
SA11n1110:908: triskandhānusāraṃ pariṇāmanā tāvat 'sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi' ityādinā ( kathitā ) |
SA11n1110:916: buddhatvamavāptuṃ praṇidhānakāle bhavatu anuttarajñānamityākārakaṃ ( praṇidhānaṃ kriyate )
SA11n1110:939: svamanaḥ svena dṛṣṭvā'ho mānaṃ styānaṃ na ca kriyāt | | (142)
SA11n1110:948: bhāratīyamahapaṇḍitena śāntarakṣitena bhoṭadeśīyānuvādakena ñevā devaghoṣeṇa cānūditā saṃśodhitā ca |
